subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador of Spain maintained the overall lead at the Spanish Vuelta while Wouter Weylandt won the 17th stage. Contador, aiming to complete a sweep of the three major cycling crowns after winning the 2007 Tour de France and the 2008 Giro d’Italia, leads Levi Leipheimer by 1 minute 17 seconds. (AP).
